Summary My 5 key areas of strength are 
 
Highly analytical: Research and data analysis has been at the foundation of all of my roles in Google. Working as a member of Google's research team, I honed my skills as a data analyst and research scientist and had the opportunity to publish over a dozen research studies, papers, and articles sharing unique data driven insights. I have won several awards within Google for applying robust analysis and measurement to my initiatives. 
 
Experienced Marketer: Within Google, I have worked as a marketer on business facing products (AdWords & Enterprise) and consumer products(Gmail & Payments). Additionally, my work in the US and emerging markets gave me intimate experience in a range of marketing channels and activities (Digital, ATL, BTL activations, events).  
 
Project Management: I have gained a wealth of experience as a project manage, earning increasingly large responsibilities and mandates within Google. I apply strict organization, clear milestones, and strong documentation to each of the projects I manage which allows me to work efficiently with my reports and stakeholders. 
 
Product Management: As a researcher and as head of growth for BebaPay I worked closely with Google's engineering team. I created product requirement/design documents for a 3 key features on the BebaPay product. Most significantly I was the lead product manager and managed a team of 7 developers to create the Google Databoard, a robust consumer facing product. http://think.withgoogle.com/databoard/ 
 
Innovation/ideation: In marketing I have earned a reputation for thinking big. In my first year I won the global Dragon's Den competition where my idea was selected from hundreds of other Google entrants. Since then I have tried to look for unique and creative solutions to all the projects I work on which has led to pop-up concerts, cross-continental campaigns, and offline initiatives in areas that google has never worked before. Summary Rupin Pahwa is someone who is constantly questioning the status-quo, challenging himself and people around him to do more. He believes that life should be a continuous pursuit of learning, growing and excelling.  
 
He has spent the last 3 and half years working in Google in various capacities.  
He has worked on SMB & Consumer Marketing Projects covering a wide variety of products and services under the Google Product Portfolio. 
 
He is an Online Search and Display Marketing Expert with extensive knowledge of Google AdWords, Facebook Marketing, etc. 
 
He has worked with clients in Australia, New Zealand, North America, Germany, Russia, India and other South Asian Countries like Indonesia and Singapore in different capacities as an Ad Policy Expert, AdWords Specialist.  
 
He has also worked with the Youtube team and has helped hundreds of musicians in understanding the YT Partner Program. 
 
During his stint, he won numerous peer bonuses (as a token of appreciation from his colleagues for going above and beyond in delivering exceptional results), a Platinum award in his first quarter, followed by a Gold award in his second year. 
 
He has also worked with Audi Gurgaon as a Customer Relationship Manager prior to Google 
 
He holds a Dual Specialization MBA degree (Marketing Major) and he was awarded the 'Best All Round Student (Best Manager) at the Amity University Convocation.  
 
He believes that a healthy mind resides in a healthy body and swears by Tae;kwan-do, Karate, Kick boxing and other Martial arts techniques to keep oneself fit. 
He loves Rock Climbing, Swimming as physical sports 
 
Outside work, he is passionate about Music - knows how to play 7 instruments and is a respected Singer-Songwriter in the Delhi Music Circuit. 
He won the prestigious India KWC Finale 2013 and represented India at the KWC Finals in Laapeenranta, Finland.
